name: On The Edge of War
description:
A Brief Look At The Game:

this game is a 3d top down shooter, you the player control  a battle ship that can dash into other ships and destroy them and pick up their weapons/shields and use them. your goal is to not die and do let any enemy ship get passed you

Note:

you have 2 friendly Cannons helping you out But they are slow at shooting

Controls:

"a" and "d" keys to rotate the ship or "right arrow" and "left arrow" keys to rotate the ship.

space to dash

"s" or down arrow key to slow down

hold or tab "e" key to pickup upgrades when they drop from destroyed enemies
